rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses factual advice ('urged... to report') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with explicit scale or impact information.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment provides recommendations but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes urging reporting ('urged... to report') as a safeguard/surveillance measure without active reassurance.
